transcript_chunks.text: this [ __ ] means something to me you know what I mean this this story means something to me it is so [ __ ] dumb it is absolutely ridiculous uh but I just couldn't stop playing it and there was no point in the game where I was bored and then I beat the game and I just couldn't stop saying the word great like you know what I mean like I just I just could it's it's an8 out of 10 for me
